summary: Llewellyn is now female and can sing "Dragonborn Comes" and "Ragnar the Red"
descriptionHtml:
This was made in response to a request.

This mod makes Llewellyn the Nightingale a female and able to sing "Dragonborn Comes" and "Ragnar the Red".

This should be compatible with anything that does not modify the Llewellyn npc.

This mod requires the dlc Hearthfire.

If you want me to change her look then PM me or leave a comment.

Please endorse if you like this mod.

PM me for more requests, ideas, advice, complaints, etc.

Check out my other mods here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/7172874/?tb=mods&pUp=1
author: MinisterTanner
